LINKEDIN_JOB_RECORDS_FEED_LIMIT.description: LinkedIN jobs feed max records limit (optional)

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Twilio account SID (required if SEND_SMS_NOTIFICATIONS is true)

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Twilio auth token (required if SEND_SMS_NOTIFICATIONS is true)

TWILIO_NUMBER.description: Twilio phone number (required if SEND_SMS_NOTIFICATIONS is true)

S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: AWS S3 bucket name (required for image upload)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key id (required for image upload)

AWS_REGION.description: AWS region (required for image upload, for example eu-west-1)

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret access key (required for image upload)

MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token for Mapbox used in the admins tools

ARBETSFORMEDLINGEN_ADMIN_EMAIL.description: Arbetsförmedlingen admin email (required for Arbetsförmedlingen sync)

FRILANS_FINANS_BASE_URI.description: Frilans Finans API base URI (required for invoices)

FRILANS_FINANS_CLIENT_ID.description: Frilans Finans API OAuth client id (required for invoices)

FRILANS_FINANS_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Frilans Finans API OAuth client secret (required for invoices)

DOCUMENT_PARSER_ACTIVE.description: Document Parser active (required for document text extraction)

APACHE_TIKA_URL.description: URL to a Apache Tika server (required for document text extraction)

KEEP_APPLICANT_DATA_YEARS.description: Keep applicant data for X number of years

ANONYMIZATION_DELAY_DAYS.description: Wait for X number of days before performing the anonymization
